includeTests.description: When true includes the test files for each block in the same directory.

watermark.description: When true will add a watermark with the version and repository at the top of the installed files.

formatter.description: The formatter to use when adding or updating files.

configFiles.description: Config file names mapped to their respective path.

paths.description: Paths used to map categories to a directory. TypeScript path aliases are allowed, any relative paths must start with `./`

*.description: The default path for blocks to be installed in your project.
